TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission is Now Live!

Articles.Content:
<p><span><em><strong>Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission</strong></em> is now live and available for update through the <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> patcher or through the <strong>Steam</strong> store. </span><span>Here’s a look at some of the many new things you’ll find in the <em><strong>ARM</strong></em> update:</span></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/6c1cf85f9c5884661ddf08488c409a92/tumblr_inline_n3d8br0ALp1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><span class="text_exposed_show">This update is very <a href="http://bit.ly/1juf82D"><strong>SPECIAL</strong></a> to us and we hope you enjoy it. While you wait, mark the occasion by watching the <em><strong>ARM</strong></em> cinematic trailer.<iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/H9fvjKVuULQ" width="420"></iframe></span></p>
I have barely sleept tonight due to work, but i have to play it as soon as i get home
Awwwwwwww yea at last.

And I just walked in the door, flipped my computer on, eat something, and boom.

I was actually checking to turn off automatic updates. Bout 3 minutes too late.

Edit: Remember to remove KAS!

Good work fellas. I watched this thing come together and ya'll work hard.

Another Edit:

Is it supposed to reset all your science or is there something wrong?

Edited April 1, 2014 by MortalDanger

Don't get too excited and look at date. They just want to fool us into thinking that "soon" is already over.

I'm wondering if they disclose what role NASA really played for this update and if it will come up in the news outside of the gaming community.
And I bet you guys aer happy that is out too. =^.^=
Dang it! So the whole talk about now knowing when, "sometimes in April" was April fool's joke? Well played.

Nah, just the way Squad keep release date info very tightly guarded. If they even suggest "in a day or two" then the forum server melts down because of 100s of Kerbalistas hitting Refresh every 30 seconds!

The only thing you can be pretty sure of in regards to releases is that they are not released on a Thursday or Friday. This is so the support team can get to grips with any issues that come up in the first few days of wildplay.

Wooooo! I'll enjoy! I bet the "arm update" on the website is actually a release of .23... xD Idk I can't download at school so I'll be playing later!

Edited April 1, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
I knew it was going to be today!!! Can't wait to get home.
Wooo! can't wait to get on my computer
FFS! You had to release it while I was at school! Either way though, YAY! ARM!

Dang it! So the whole talk about now knowing when, "sometimes in April" was April fool's joke? Well played.

Technically it is sometime in April, but YAY! none the less.

moved to correct thread

Edited April 1, 2014 by Seshins
moved
It. Is. Here!!!!!

Oh god, I'm having so much fun planning my ARM mission. This is great!

And for those who cannot find asteroids on previous (sandbox) saves, make a new sandbox save, wait for some asteroids to spawn then reopen your old save. Worked fine enough for me.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m probably going to load up my career save and see how this goes. Alternatively, I will make a sandbox save and see where I can go with the 3.75 meter parts!
Can't wait to get home. Excitment levels just went through the roof !!!!!!!
Am I the only one who can't find the new attachment thingy in the tech tree?

CALLED IT. EFfING CALLED IT! TUESDAY.

April Fools' day can suck it. Of course I'm still downloading with a slight bit of caution in case it really is a prank.

But did I call it, or did I CALL IT?
Whelp. Thanks SQUAD. You released this 10 mins after I went to school. Well played....
Congrats, Squad. I will most certainly enjoy!
Loving it so far! Thank you for the great update, Squad!
